Querys.query: CREATE TABLE user_( userId int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, firstName varchar(50), lastName varchar(50), email varchar(50), dob date )

CREATE TABLE player( playerId int(10) PRIMARY KEY,
CONSTRAINT playerf1 FOREIGN KEY(playerId) REFERENCES user_(userId) )

CREATE TABLE gameseller( gsId int(10) PRIMARY KEY, companyName varchar(50),
CONSTRAINT gamesellerf1 FOREIGN KEY(gsId) REFERENCES user_(userId) )

CREATE TABLE game( gameId int(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, gamesellerID int(10), gameName varchar(50), category varchar(50), gamePoster varchar(100),
CONSTRAINT gamefk1 FOREIGN KEY(gamesellerID) REFERENCES gameseller(gsId) )

CREATE TABLE forum_admin( forumAID int(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, firstName varchar(50), lastName varchar(50), email varchar(100)
)

CREATE TABLE product_admin( productAID int(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, firstName varchar(50), lastName varchar(50), email varchar(100)
)

CREATE TABLE forum( forumId int(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, posterID int(10), forumAdminId int(10), discussionTitle varchar(100), discussionContent varchar(500),
CONSTRAINT forumfk1 FOREIGN KEY(posterID) REFERENCES user_(userId), CONSTRAINT forumfk2 FOREIGN KEY(forumAdminId) REFERENCES forum_admin(forumAID) )
